sense.def:
To behave in a particular way
pomeni ravnati na določen način.

seg.quote: In New York, he had behaved in a very strange way.
You are behaving like a silly child.

sense.def:
To behave oneself
pomeni ravnati tako, kot se ljudem zdi prav in spodobno.

seg.quote: Their startled boyfriends got warnings to behave.
He's old enough to behave himself.
